overview: In 1998, Brad and Deborah Wells left the comfort and familiarity of their home in Boise, Idaho and moved their family to the remote jungles of Papua New Guinea. Today, they continue to serve as missionaries along with their seven children and lead an inspiring life, captured by this documentary film. Follow them through both setbacks and accomplishments as they share God's Word, raise a family, and establish the country's first Christian radio station.
title: Two Hats
